properties.name: Piaget's Water Jar Task
properties.alias: water jug task, water jug problem
properties.definition_text: This task tests whether children understand the principle of conservation, or the idea that two objects are still equivalent after a transformation of one of them.  Specifically, the "Water Jar Task" tests if children have attained "conservation of liquid quantity." The child is asked to assess if the same amount of water in different glasses is in fact equal.
